technical_skills.question: Do I need technical skills to create a course?
technical_skills.answer: No! Strongbodyal is extremely user-friendly. You can create and launch your course with simple drag-and-drop actions — no coding needed.

platform_cost.question: How much does it cost to use the platform?
platform_cost.answer: You can pay $10/month for more courses plus a low 20% commission for payouts — one of the most affordable fees available.

international_sales.question: Can I sell my course to international students?
international_sales.answer: Yes! Thanks to automatic translation tools, you can easily reach students from all over the world.

payment_method.question: How will I get paid?
payment_method.answer: Payments are transferred directly to your linked bank account or via global gateways like PayPal or Stripe.

course_updates.question: Can I update my course after it's published?
course_updates.answer: Definitely! You can add, add new content, or update your course anytime — keeping it fresh and valuable for students.
